column1: Little Goat Diner////- Rushed service: I think the entire restaurant was running behind (perhaps this happens a lot here). So as a result
column2: everything was rushed. Waitress came by to take our plates when I was done but my friend was clearly still eating. Waitress swooped in to take our check when I had just set down my credit card but my friend was still fetching hers
column3: leaving me to get up and run after her. Waitress promised to check with kitchen on cooking my steak medium before placing my order and didn't!
